All lots extended with any bid to any lot...https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5277761.0Shipping: Paid for by buyer. Ships from USA. Buyer responsible for any and all customs/dutiesPayment Address: Bitcoin address goes here, unless using escrow.  Payment Due: Within 24 hoursEscrow: Available at cost of buyer
